metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6091 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Service Workers can intercept any request made by an <embed> or <object>tag in Fetch API in Google Chrome prior to 66.0.3359.117 allowed a remoteattacker to leak cross-origin data via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
